chatpacking.gcfill: Fills the gc your in with your tokens
chatpacking.gcleave: Makes all tokens leave the gc
chatpacking.autofill: Enables a setting on launch where if you get added to any gc, your tokens join with you
chatpacking.death: Presses the user with tokens | Usage: $death <@user> <n> <optional second name>
chatpacking.untouchable: Changes the gc name and presses the user with the tokens | Usage: $untouchable <@user> <n>
chatpacking.gcss: Tokens change gc name | Usage: $gcss <n> <optional second name>
chatpacking.kill: Sends messages till rate limit | Usage: $kill <@user>
chatpacking.ar: Auto replies to user messages | Usage: $ar <@user> <message>
chatpacking.ar2: Floods a channel and sends the last message | Usage: $ar2 <@user> <message>

token_utility.tjoin: Tokens join a server | Usage: $tjoin roster
token_utility.rpcall: Rotating all tokens rpc | Usage: $rpcall test1,test2,test3
token_utility.mreact: All tokens react to messages | Usage: $mreact <@user> <emoji>

event_reactions.eonmessage: Edit message on event | Usage: $eonmessage <@user> | Subcommands: on <message>, add <message> <edited_message>, list, remove <message>, clear, on/off
event_reactions.ronping: React on ping | Usage: $ronping <@user> | Subcommands: set <emoji>, show, remove, on/off
event_reactions.sonping: Send message on ping | Usage: $sonping <@user> | Subcommands: set <response>, show, remove, on/off
event_reactions.keywordr: Keyword responses | Subcommands: add <word>, <response>, remove <word>, list, clear, on/off, ignore <user_id>, unignore <user_id>
event_reactions.reactkw: Keyword reactions | Subcommands: add <word>, <emoji>, remove <word>, list, clear, on/off

groupchat.antigcspam: Anti groupchat spam | Subcommands: whitelist, blacklist, silent, message, autoremove, webhook, autoblock, list
groupchat.autogc: Auto groupchat | Subcommands: stop, whitelist, whitelistr, list
groupchat.autogcleave: Auto leave groupchats | Subcommands: stop, status

auto_messenger.msgtime: Timed messages | Usage: $msgtime <minutes> <message(s)> | Subcommands: help, on, off, status, list, clear, remove
auto_messenger.purgekwdm: Purge DM messages by keyword | Usage: $purgekwdm <keyword>
auto_messenger.purgekwserver: Purge server messages by keyword | Usage: $purgekwserver <keyword>

Favorites.fav add: Add command to favorites | Usage: $fav add <command> [note]
Favorites.fav remove: Remove command from favorites | Usage: $fav remove <command>
Favorites.fav pin: Pin command to top of favorites | Usage: $fav pin <command>
Favorites.fav unpin: Unpin command from top | Usage: $fav unpin <command>
Favorites.fav alias: Create custom alias for command | Usage: $fav alias <command> <alias>
Favorites.fav stats: View usage statistics for favorite commands
Favorites.favhelp: Show favorites help page with all commands and features
Favorites.favorites: Alternative command to view your favorites list

antitoken.antitoken limit mass_dm <amount>: Set mass DM limit per minute
antitoken.antitoken limit guild_actions <amount>: Set guild actions limit per minute
antitoken.antitoken limit account_changes <amount>: Set account changes limit per minute

token controller.tokens: Start token control session and select server/channel
token controller.tokens prefix <text>: Set text to add before each mirrored message
token controller.tokens suffix <text>: Set text to add after each mirrored message
token controller.tokens mirror: Start mirroring messages with selected tokens
token controller.tokens stop: Stop the current token control session

owo hunt.autohunt: Start auto hunting with OwO bot
owo hunt.autohunt set hunt_min <seconds>: Set minimum delay between hunt commands
owo hunt.autohunt set hunt_max <seconds>: Set maximum delay between hunt commands

knightfall.nuke channels: Set number of channels to create
knightfall.nuke roles: Set number of roles to create

protection.softban: Ban and unban to clear messages
protection.ghostban: Ban user without being in server

voice.voice move: Move a user to another channel
voice.voice region: Set voice region for better connection
